author: benh
msg: Another bug fix that applies in newer Mesos versions (wrong format was given for this option.. but it's true by default anyway so I just removed the argument)

author: benh
msg: Commented out multiple slaves per node option -- not sure we want to have it

author: benh
msg: Fixed a bug introduced by copy/paste from old scripts

author: benh
msg: A couple of fixes to the EC2 scripts
- Setup was not working because it used relative paths without cd'ing into mesos-ec2

- Slave setup was creating /mnt2, /mnt3 and /mnt4 directories even on nodes that don't have all the ephemeral devices, which would result in Hadoop writing too much data to the root partition (since these were never mounted to some other device)
